channel.title: Auto restarter help
channel.description: When i run my voule Auto restarter it restarts and evreything but when it restarts it says couldn't start port 43594 allready in use? so then i have to manualy restart does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Auto restarter help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Use whichever one actually runs. Uhm… server.clientListener = null; ? You have to close the listener. You should learn that outside of private servers first, like with a basic .java file with a purpose of closing the listener. You’ll appreciate the knowledge learned, and it’ll be more effective.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter help
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

eh I did this is my setup. Runserver.bat Voule Restarter.exe Voule.bat now what I do is run Voule Restarter.exe and hit start and it pops up runs but when it restarts it says java was not found or something and port is allready in use

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter help
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

It showing “Couldn’t start port 43594 already in use?” means that you have not closed down your original run.bat before running the voule.bat. Voule auto restarter acts as a normal runserver.bat with an extra restarting script inside the batch code. Try clicking out of your original runserver.bat and then open up voule.bat. Hope this works bud

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter help
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

make an auto restarter in notepad save as .bat

Read full topic
